Requirements and Running
===============================================================================

Must use Python 3.5 or higher. In the terminal enter:
$ python s5.py


AWS authentication
===============================================================================

S5-S3conf must be in the same directory as the python script. Also, it must
contain two lines. The first line is the aws_access_key_id and the second line
is the aws_secret_access_key. Nothing else should be in the file.

"the S5-S3conf file should be identical to the credential file generated by AWS CLI" - discord
